page.title: 10RHYMNEY BIOGRAPHIES
page.content: The Valleys of South Wales have traditionally produced poets and musicians of the highest calibre, and the Upper Rhymney Valley is no exception. It seems that the Welsh way of life is conducive to producing talent and genius. Those of artistic talent were born into a harsh working class background,and yet against almost insurmountable odds reached up to the pinnacle of success in their own chosen fields.Much of their work centr ed on the life of the working man and the impact of early industrial communities on an often drab and drear y existence.As chroniclers of their times their social comments are invaluable,since they were often able to bring out the warmth of family life in those hard depressing times.
